Concordance Table: H3 to H1

Source: R/data.R
H3_H1.Rd

Concordance table from HS 2007 (H3) to HS 1996 (H1)

H3_H1

Format

A data frame with 5,052 rows and 4 variables:

HS 2007 Product Code

Harmonised System HS 2007 (H3) Product code.

HS 2007 Product Description

Harmonised System HS 2007 (H3) Product description.

HS 1996 Product Code

Harmonised System HS 1996 (H1) Product code.

HS 1996 Product Description

Harmonised System HS 1996 (H1) Product description.

Source

https://wits.worldbank.org/product_concordance.html

Examples

H3_H1

#> # A tibble: 5,052 x 4
#>    `HS 2007 Product~ `HS 2007 Product Des~ `HS 1996 Produc~ `HS 1996 Product De~
#>    <chr>             <chr>                 <chr>            <chr>               
#>  1 010110            Live horses/asses/mu~ 010111           Horses :-- Pure-bre~
#>  2 010190            Live horses/asses/mu~ 010120           Asses, mules and hi~
#>  3 010210            Live bovine animals:~ 010210           Pure-bred breeding ~
#>  4 010290            Live bovine animals ~ 010290           Other               
#>  5 010310            Live swine: pure-bre~ 010310           Pure-bred breeding ~
#>  6 010391            Live swine other tha~ 010391           Other :-- Weighing ~
#>  7 010392            Live swine other tha~ 010392           Other :-- Weighing ~
#>  8 010410            Live sheep            010410           Sheep               
#>  9 010420            Live goats            010420           Goats               
#> 10 010511            Live fowls of specie~ 010511           Weighing not more t~
#> # ... with 5,042 more rows
